TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TextElementEditingBehaviorAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class TextElementEditingBehaviorAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class TextElementEditingBehaviorAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定 应如何处理自定义文本元素。

span.span: Specifies how a should handle a custom text element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建自定义文本元素时, 可以使用属性指定应将元素视为单个 unbreakable 实体。When you create a custom text element, you can use the attribute to specify that the element should be treated as a single, unbreakable entity. `false` 如果和属性设置为, 则当用户编辑时, 将保留元素的边界和内容。 When the and properties are set to `false`, a preserves the boundaries and content of the element when the user edits the . 通常, 自定义元素的行为类似于。In general, the custom element behaves similar to a . 当你使用此类并将其两个属性都设置为`false`时, 将出现以下行为:The following behavior occurs when you use this class and set both of its properties to `false`: - 当用户在自定义元素中复制和粘贴部分内容时, 不会保留复制文本的格式设置。When a user copies and pastes a part of the content in a custom element, the formatting of the copied text is not preserved. - 当用户在自定义元素的内容之前或之后键入内容时, 新内容不获取自定义元素的格式信息。When a user types before or after the content of the custom element, the new content does not acquire the custom element's formatting information. - 用户无法在自定义元素中插入换行符。The user cannot insert a line break in the custom element. 创建自定义元素时, 使用方法, 并将设置`preserveTextElements`为`true` , 以便在将自定义元素和属性值序列化到磁盘或剪贴板时保留这些值。When you create a custom element, use the method and set `preserveTextElements` to `true` to preserve the custom element and property values when you serialize it to the disk or clipboard. .NET Framework 版本3.5 中引入。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 是否可以合并两个相邻的文本元素。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the can merge two adjacent text elements.

value.span: 如果 可以合并具有相同属性值的相邻自定义文本元素，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if a is free to merge adjacent custom text elements that have identical property values; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当为`true`时, 决定是将具有相同属性值的相邻文本元素组合在一起的决定。When is `true`, the decision to combine adjacent text elements that have identical property values is left up to the . 当为`false`时, 不会合并两个相邻的文本元素。When is `false`, a does not combine two adjacent text elements. .NET Framework 版本3.5 中引入。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是由文本元素基于字符提供格式，还是将格式应用到整个元素。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the text element provides formatting on a character basis, or if the formatting applies to the entire element.

value.span: 如果应将格式应用到单个的字符，则为 ；如果应将格式应用到整个元素，则为 。

span.span: if formatting should apply to the individual characters; if the formatting should apply to the entire element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 为`true`并且用户复制并粘贴自定义文本元素的部分内容时, 将保留格式设置。When is `true` and the user copies and pastes part of the content of a custom text element, the formatting is preserved. 当 为`false`时, 仅当用户复制并粘贴自定义文本元素的所有内容时, 才保留格式设置。When is `false`, the formatting is preserved only if the user copies and pastes all of the content of the custom text element. .NET Framework 版本3.5 中引入。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
